author: Mitch Hedberg
quote: I'm sick of following my dreams, man. I'm just going to ask where they're going and hook up with ’em later.

author: President Merkin Muffley (Peter Sellers), Dr. Strangelove
quote: Gentlemen, you can't fight in here. This is the war room.

author: Rose (Betty White), The Golden Girls
quote: My mother always used to say: The older you get, the better you get, unless you’re a banana.

author: David Letterman
quote: Halloween is the beginning of the holiday shopping season. That’s for women. The beginning of the holiday shopping season for men is Christmas Eve

author: Jack Handey
quote: Before you criticize someone, you should walk a mile in their shoes. That way when you criticize them, you are a mile away from them and you have their shoes.

author: Mark Twain
quote: Clothes make the man. Naked people have little or no influence in society.

author: Will Ferrell
quote: Before you marry a person, you should first make them use a computer with slow Internet to see who they really are.

author: Rita Rudner
quote: I love being married. It's so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.

author: Phyllis Diller
quote: I want my children to have all the things I couldn't afford. Then I want to move in with them.

author: Erma Bombeck
quote: When your mother asks, ‘Do you want a piece of advice?’ it is a mere formality. It doesn’t matter if you answer yes or no. You’re going to get it anyway.

author: Ellen DeGeneres
quote: Never follow anyone else’s path. Unless you’re in the woods and you’re lost and you see a path. Then by all means follow that path.

author: Anonymous
quote: Insomnia sharpens your math skills because you spend all night calculating how much sleep you’ll get if you’re able to ‘fall asleep right now.

author: Jerry (Jerry Seinfeld), Seinfeld
quote: Breaking up is like knocking over a Coke machine. You can’t do it in one push; you got to rock it back and forth a few times, and then it goes over.

author: Michael Scott (Steve Carrell), The Office
quote: I’m not superstitious, but I am a little stitious.

author: Anonymous
quote: I walk around like everything’s fine, but deep down, inside my shoe, my sock is sliding off.

author: Rodney Dangerfield
quote: I haven't spoken to my wife in years. I didn't want to interrupt her.

author: Les Dawson
quote: I used to sell furniture for a living. The trouble was, it was my own.

author: Surgeon (Graham Chapman), Monty Python’s Flying Circus
quote: There’s nothing wrong with you that an expensive operation can’t prolong.

author: Steven Wright
quote: Someone asked me, if I were stranded on a desert island what book would I bring: ‘How to Build a Boat.’

author: Mindy Kaling, Is Everyone Hanging Out Without Me?
quote: There is no sunrise so beautiful that it is worth waking me up to see it.

author: Joan Rivers
quote: You know you’ve reached middle age when you’re cautioned to slow down by your doctor, instead of by the police.

author: Lt. Frank Drebin (Leslie Nielsen), Naked Gun 2½: The Smell of Fear
quote: Truth hurts. Maybe not as much as jumping on a bicycle with a seat missing, but it hurts.

author: Bobby Boucher (Adam Sandler), The Waterboy
quote: My Mama says that alligators are ornery because they got all them teeth and no toothbrush.

author: Jimmy Kimmel
quote: I never feel more alone than when I’m trying to put sunscreen on my back.

author: Pete (Paul Rudd), Knocked Up
quote: Marriage is like an unfunny, tense version of Everybody Loves Raymond, but it doesn’t last 22 minutes. It lasts forever.

author: Lessons from the Minivan
quote: Being a mom means never buying the right amount of produce. Either everyone suddenly loves grapes and a week’s worth are eaten in one afternoon, or fruit flies are congregating around my rotting bananas.

author: Sheldon Cooper (Jim Parsons), The Big Bang Theory
quote: I’m not insane. My mother had me tested.

author: Elise (Goldie Hawn), The First Wives Club
quote: There are only three ages for women in Hollywood: babe, district attorney and Driving Miss Daisy.

author: Jerry Seinfeld
quote: I saw a study that said speaking in front of a crowd is considered the number one fear of the average person. Number two was death. This means to the average person, if you have to be at a funeral, you would rather be in the casket than doing the eulogy.

author: Anonymous
quote: Common sense is like deodorant. The people who need it most never use it.

author: Clark Griswold (Chevy Chase), National Lampoon’s Christmas Vacation
quote: If I woke up tomorrow with my head sewn to the carpet, I wouldn’t be more surprised.

author: Dowager Countess Violet Crawley (Maggie Smith), Downton Abbey
quote: There’s nothing simpler than avoiding people you don’t like. Avoiding one’s friends, that’s the real test.

author: Ace Ventura (Jim Carrey), Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
quote: If I’m not back in five minutes, just wait longer.

author: Clairee Belcher (Olivia Dukakis), Steel Magnolias
quote: The only thing that separates us from the animals is our ability to accessorize.

author: Anonymous
quote: I’m at a place in my life when errands are starting to count as going out.

author: Graham Norton
quote: A good rule to remember for life is that when it comes to plastic surgery and sushi, never be attracted by a bargain.

author: Chandler (Matthew Perry), Friends
quote: I’m not good at the advice. Can I interest you in a sarcastic comment?

author: George Carlin
quote: Here’s all you have to know about men and women: Women are crazy, men are stupid. And the main reason women are crazy is that men are stupid.

author: Larry (Larry David), Curb Your Enthusiasm
quote: When I'm in social situations, I always hold onto my glass. It makes me feel comfortable and secure and I don't have to shake hands.

author: Sir Norman Wisdom
quote: As you get older, three things happen. The first is your memory goes, and I can’t remember the other two.

author: Midge Maisel (Rachel Brosnahan), The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel
quote: That’s why New York is so great, though. Everyone you care about can despise you and you can still find a bagel so good, nothing else matters. Who needs love when you’ve got lox? They both stink, but only one tastes good.

author: Adam Gropman
quote: Here’s some advice: At a job interview, tell them you’re willing to give 110 percent. Unless the job is a statistician.

author: Neil DeGrasse Tyson
quote: Does it disturb anyone else that ‘The Los Angeles Angels’ baseball team translates directly to ‘The The Angels Angels’?

author: Groucho Marx
quote: I never forget a face, but in your case I’ll be glad to make an exception.

author: Jay Leno
quote: Here’s something to think about: How come you never see a headline like ‘Psychic Wins Lottery’?

author: Steve Martin
quote: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.

author: Dave Barry
quote: My therapist told me the way to achieve true inner peace is to finish what I start. So far I’ve finished two bags of M&Ms and a chocolate cake. I feel better already.

author: Frank Semyon (Vince Vaughn), True Detective
quote: Never do anything out of hunger. Not even eating.

author: Aunt Voula (Andrea Martin), My Big Fat Greek Wedding
quote: What do you mean, he don't eat no meat? That's okay, that's okay. I make lamb.

author: George Burns
quote: You know you’re getting old when you stoop to tie your shoelaces and wonder what else you could do while you’re down there.

author: Wanda (Jamie Lee Curtis), A Fish Called Wanda
quote: To call you stupid would be an insult to stupid people!

author: Shelley Darlingson (Anna Faris), The House Bunny
quote: Instead of the mahi mahi, may I just get the one mahi because I’m not that hungry?

author: Ellen DeGeneres
quote: Accept who you are. Unless you’re a serial killer.

author: Tina Fey, Bossypants
quote: My ability to turn good news into anxiety is rivaled only by my ability to turn anxiety into chin acne.

author: Anonymous
quote: There is one word that describes people that don't like me: Irrelevant.

author: Robin Williams
quote: Why do they call it rush hour when nothing moves?

author: Dory (Ellen DeGeneres), Finding Dory
quote: I remember it like it was yesterday. Of course, I don’t really remember yesterday all that well.

author: Dr. Peter Venkman (Bill Murray), Ghostbusters
quote: I don’t have to take this abuse from you; I’ve got hundreds of people dying to abuse me.

author: Bob Hope
quote: I grew up with six brothers. That's how I learned to dance: waiting for the bathroom.

author: Claire Foster (Tina Fey), Date Night
quote: If we’re going to pay this much for crab, it better sing and dance and introduce us to the Little Mermaid.

author: Anonymous
quote: I prefer not to think before speaking. I like being as surprised as everyone else by what comes out of my mouth.

author: Mark Twain
quote: Never put off till tomorrow what you can do the day after tomorrow just as well.

author: Grumpy Cat
quote: Woke up today. It was terrible.

author: Anonymous
quote: Eggs are fantastic for a fitness diet. If you don’t like the taste, just add cocoa, flour, sugar, butter, baking powder and cook at 350 for 30 minutes.

author: Meme attributed to Shaquille O’Neal
quote: I can’t end my messages with Love, Shaq because the B-52s ruined that for me.

author: Halley Reed (Mia Farrow), Crimes and Misdemeanors
quote: My husband and I fell in love at first sight. Maybe I should have taken a second look.

author: Erma Bombeck
quote: Thanksgiving dinners take 18 hours to prepare. They are consumed in 12 minutes. Half-times take 12 minutes. This is not a coincidence.

author: Mortimer Brewster (Cary Grant), Arsenic and Old Lace
quote: Insanity runs in my family. It practically gallops.

author: Lillian (Maya Rudolph), Bridesmaids
quote: Why can't you just be happy for me and then go home and talk behind my back later like a normal person?

author: Oscar Wilde
quote: Anyone who lives within their means suffers from a lack of imagination.

author: Harry (Billy Crystal), When Harry Met Sally
quote: What they could do to make it easier is combine the two, real estate and obituaries: Mr. Klein died today leaving a wife, two children, and a spacious three-bedroom apartment with a wood-burning fireplace.
